price: Canke bagashikirwa n’ibihano giturumbuka, bari mu kwishira no kwizana[337]! Nta ho rero bohungira ibihano vy’Imana Allah, canke ngo bayinanire Ishatse kubahana;
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
footnotes: [337] Canke ko Imana Allah Itobahanisha gukehanirwa mu matungo n’umwimbu, no kubura ababo.

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
